discourse_list.title: Liquidity mining for real world asset

content.content: Hi fellow makers, I’m new to this forum so I don’t know about the risks but I was wondering if we can do liquidity mining for people who take loans from real world assets. Because for lending against crypto maker offers the best rate and there is no need to do this to increase usage, but RWA are new and this can make the adoption much faster. We don’t necessarily have to dilute the tokens and can use DAO funds to do this.
I don’t think there’s a shortage of willing RWA borrowers, the challenge is in the structuring to make sure that the DAO has appropriate recourse in the event of a breach/default.
